abstract: Long Island Rail Road retirees continue to seek, and receive, disability payments, despite revelations of a chronic pattern of abuse of the public benefits system.
snippet: After revelations of a chronic pattern of abuse of the public benefits system, retirees at the Long Island Rail Road continue to seek, and receive, disability payments.
lead_paragraph: After revelations of a chronic pattern of abuse of the public benefits system, retirees at the Long Island Rail Road continue to seek, and receive, disability payments.

headline.main: Despite Attention to Abuses, Disability Filings at the L.I.R.R. Remain High
headline.print_headline: Despite Attention to Abuses, Disability Filings at the L.I.R.R. Remain High
headline.seo: L.I.R.R. Retirees Still Seek Disability Benefits at a High Rate
